entries.title: REGULATIONS | Da Afghanistan Bank
entries.text: Da Afghanistan Bank has regulations on microfinance, licensing, corporate governance, capital adequacy, liquidity, KYC, and AML/CFT, among others.

entries.title: Reporting Formats and Guidelines - Da Afghanistan Bank
entries.text: Reporting formats include balance sheets, deposit breakdowns, income statements, loan portfolio lists, and past due schedules. All are in FS Formats.

entries.title: Monetary Policy Communication | Da Afghanistan Bank
entries.text: Monetary Policy Decisions are issued in every quarter four times a year after the meetings of Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) members.

entries.title: All News | Da Afghanistan Bank
entries.text: June 3, 2025 – Sediqullah Khalid, the first deputy governor of Da Afghanistan Bank, officially reopened the Afghanistan Institute of Banking and Finance (AIBF).
